author: ema
msg: * [CXF-1214]Updated callback systest to use new W3CEndpointRefrence class to pass the wsdlLocation ,service name and other stuff
* exclude xalan.jar dependency that makes jaxb generate wrong xml
* wss4j depends the xalan.jar , so disable ws-security system test. After wss4j fixed this issue or we find another solution, we can enable this test.

author: rpluem
msg: * Using the reslist pool for the proxy_conn_rec structure introduces a memory
leak when connections get created and destroyed frequently by the reslist
(e.g.  destroying idle elements of the reslist). So use the subpool
dedicated for the proxy_conn_rec structure to allocate the memory for the
